tns:patch.author: esoliani
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_funding_closing_date AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id,f.funding_closing_date, f.type_of_assistance_category_va as terms_assist_id, f.financing_instr_category_value as financing_instrument_id, f.amp_donor_org_id as donor_org_id, f.mode_of_payment_category_va as mode_of_payment_id, f.funding_status_category_va as funding_status_id, f.agreement as agreement_id, f.amp_funding_id as funding_id FROM amp_funding f JOIN amp_activity_version a ON f.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id;
